import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Remaining Email Verification Cooldown"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/auth/email/verification/cooldown"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the remaining time in seconds until you can send another email verification email.

You can find more information about email verification [here](../../docs/guides/auth/authentication#email-verification).

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token) is required.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"email","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The remaining cooldown.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"remaining":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}},"required":["remaining"],"title":"MailCooldownResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"AccessToken is invalid or expired.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
